org.oxcart.streams

Class ReadAheadInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.oxcart.streams.ReadAheadInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ReadAheadInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
implements java.lang.Runnable
    An InputStream that reads ahead in the background and buffers data via the file system. ReadAheadInputStreams are opened using open.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close() 
      int getBufferedBytes()
      Returns the number of bytes buffered up to this point.
      static ReadAheadInputStream open(IStreamProvider streamProvider, java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService)
      Open a new ReadAheadInputStream that wraps the supplied originalStream and that reads ahead using a task submitted to the provided ExecutorService.
      int read() 
      void run()
